purpose: To explore and iterate value creation arbitrages for four sets of levers.
title: Value creation arbitrages will be explored and iterated for 4 sets of levers

bullets.text: Fiber rollout / planning / capex: Review existing fiber plan, within market and competitive context
Understand impact of adjusting key levers: Scale of roll-out, Phasing of roll-out, Operational improvements (planning, controls), Commercial support
Topline & EBITDA trajectory: 360 review of existing business plan and associated TSR
Frame options to adjust EBITDA trajectory, and understand TSR impact: Productivity boost (e.g., digital, automation), Revenue interdependencies with Fiber roll out
Infrastructure Plays: Identify operational feasibility of alternative network ownership options, and outline longer-term competitive implications
Model high level impact on financials: Network sharing, Network JV, Network separation, TowerCo carve-out, Etc
Debt vs Dividend Strategy: Review current dividend plan and forward looking statements, in context of capital requirements
Calculate alternative options for funding: Reduce dividend, Increase debt, Reduce spending (network investment)

reasoning_strategy: Comparison and evaluation of different strategies.
